results.headline: Office Space (Movie)

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of Office Space

results.summary_short: Anyone who has endured work as a low-level cog in a corporate machine should appreciate the acute frustrations of the eager young beavers who rebel against the system in Mike Judge's moderately savvy satire "Office Space."
